Posts.Content: Hi I tried to find a discussion I saw in November on this site describing a drug that was a kinder version of Tamoxifen.  I cant find the blog.  Can anyone else remember seeing it? I am struggling on my 7th month with all the side effects you have described.  The lack of sleep really affects my clinical judgements at work.  My Oncologist recommended Diazepam! No comment.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen alternatives
